definition: reduced in strength or concentration or quality or purity, lessen the strength or flavor of a solution or mixture
details:
adjective
- reduced in strength or concentration or quality or purity
= example: reduced in strength or concentration or quality or purity
= synonyms: diluted
verb
- lessen the strength or flavor of a solution or mixture
= synonyms: thin
- corrupt, debase, or make impure by adding a foreign or inferior substance
= synonyms: stretch, adulterate, load, debase
